response.explain: Since no steps have been carried out yet, we need to start with the first step towards the task of cooking a brisket. From our observations, we can see that the brisket is inside the fridge which is currently closed (since 'openable' state is 0). So, our first action will be to open the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge.
(2) Move the robot close to the brisket.
(3) Pick up the brisket.
(4) Move the robot to the front of the oven.
(5) Open the oven.
(6) Put the brisket inside the oven.
(7) Close the oven.
(8) Cook the brisket.
(9) Open the oven.
(10) Take out the brisket.
(11) Move the robot back to its original position.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
